Button.name: Button
Button.description:
Built-in behaviour that handles OVER/OUT/CLICK events from mouse.
May be appended to any DisplayObject, by `behave` method.

Movimentation.name: Movimentation
Movimentation.description:
Built-in behaviour that have acceleration / friction / velocity control.
May be appended to any DisplayObject, by `DisplayObject#behave` method.

params.name: options
params.description: any attribute may be initialized by option

    var color = new Joy.Color("red");

classitems.description: Play a sound from the current time (0 by default).

params.name: sprite
params.description: (optional) Plays from the specified position in the sound sprite definition.

classitems.description: Pause playback and save the current position.

params.name: id
params.description: (optional) Used only for HTML5 Audio to pause specific node.

classitems.description: Stop playback and reset to start.
Get/set whether to loop the sound.

params.name: loop
params.description: To loop or not to loop, that is the question.

return.description: Returns self or current looping value.

params.name: offset
params.description: Where to begin playback in milliseconds

params.name: duration
params.description: How long to play in milliseconds

return.description: Returns current sprite sheet or self.

params.name: pos
params.description: The position to move current playback to.

return.description: Returns self or current playback position.

classitems.description: Fade out the current sound and pause when finished.
